title: Requirements: integration-safety-gates
five_acts: Act I - Dispatch Guardrail: block /next-finalize dispatch when canonical main preconditions are unsafe.
Act II - Apply Guardrail: re-check canonical preconditions before finalize apply instructions are consumed.
Act III - Deterministic Failures: emit stable machine-readable failure codes with explicit operator next actions.
Act IV - Regression Coverage: prove blocked and allowed branches across next-machine state and HITL contract tests.
Act V - Orchestrator Confidence: preserve happy-path finalize behavior while reducing unsafe-main regression surface.
